transcript:
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Haan. Haan sir, ab bataiye aap kya keh rahe the?
Customer: Are yaar mere bol raha hai ki wo distiller ki thi waha pe bahar ki Nepal ki to main usko accept karne ke liye kar raha hai ban nahi hoti wo to. Payment usme lagta hai.
Executive: Haan sir, export ki buyleads ke liye alag package hota hai. Matlab aapka jo package hai wo domestic wala hai, export ke liye aapko separate package lena hota hai.
Customer: Pehle to aa chuki thi mere paas buyleads pehle ki. Pehle first time se.
Executive: Export ki?
Customer: First time se kaise aa chuki thi jab export ke?
Executive: Export ke?
Customer: First mein jab open hua tha usi time.
Executive: First mein kab matlab aaj?
Customer: Pehle pehle just pehle apan ne package liya usi time.
Executive: Sir export ki nahi hogi domestic hogi.
Customer: Aisa kyun?
Executive: Export export ka to package hi different hai sir.
Customer: Nahi to usme mere ko jab Sri Lanka ki bhi mili thi ek baar, ek baar chhod ke do baar mili thi. Aisa kyun?
Executive: Ek minute rukiye mujhe dekhne dijiye kab mili hai sir. Pehle pehle pehle hi pehle ki baat chal rahi hai abhi ki baat nahi kar raha.
Executive: Abhi dekh abhi dekh rahe hai sir, main dekh rahi hu. Matlab pehle kab 2024, 2023 aisa kuch hoga?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapne liya tha 14 March 2024 mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To aapko complimentary mila tha tab.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Tab aapko ek buylead. Chalo ab mere ko ye bol raha hu abhi distiller ready pade mere paas ek 32 inch ki distiller pada hua hai, 26 inch ki distiller pada hua hai. Colour alag sab complete hai motor vagera sab complete hai sale ke liye mere ko koi aisa dekho. Koi buylead ho to usse milao aur uska jo bikao to apna package aage kuch kare. Kya? Mere paas do distiller ready mein pade hai abhi stock mein ek 32 inch ki distiller pada hai ek 26 inch pada hai. 3 HP motor mein pada hai double aur single wala pada hai. Ab koi customer to yaar aise aate hai to yaar kya kare wo unko rate bhi aise de diya aaj maine Bhopal wale se baat kari usko ₹1 lakh price de di maine aur kya karu? Uske baad jab wo keh raha hai dekhte hai bhai se puch lete hai ab usme kya kare yaar itna kam price mein bhi agar possible nahi hai to fir kya karenge? Aap line pe lijiye koi aisa ho to jaise Justdial mein rehta hai na koi customer baat karta hai wo direct company se hi baat kara deta hai aur deal kara deta hai. To koi aisa party agar aa jata hai ya koi buylead aa jati hai aisi ya koi customer aisa hota hai judta hai to aap mujhe judwa ke in mashino ko karao clear to apne paas payment aaya aur fir aage usko. Sir hum log aise baat nahi karte hai.
Customer: Are yaar kaise baat nahi karte yaar? Dekhi bol raha hu ki call aata hai to baat karta hu aur kya karu? Call aa hi nahi raha to aap bol rahe hai. Aise nahi kar aap keh rahe hai na ki aapke sath contact. Are par aapka customer meri baat suno mere mere customer care number jo aapke rehte hai waha se mere upar buylead open aap judate ho waha se number waha se direct mere number pe nahi aayenge pehle aapke company ka number ka aayega phone fir aap mere is number pe phone forward karenge. Sir but hume nahi pata kis buyer ko lena hai aur kisko nahi lena aap bataiye kaise pata. Only distiller aur machine wale ko hi lena hai double distiller ya single distiller. Sir hume ye nahi pata hoga na ki is buyer ko acche mein lena hai ya nahi lena ye dekh raha hai. Abhi rice mill aayi hui hai rice mill. Meri baat suno main to ek baat samjhu meri baat ko bhi samajh lo aap. Agar chawal rice wala hoga to wo banda nahi le payega Karnataka ki Karnataka ka hoga to bhi nahi le payega. Haan MP ke aas paas hoga to le lega. Kya? Baki karna Karnataka wala to nahi le payega unki boli bhi samajh mein aati hai. Udisha wala bhi nahi le payega uski boli to language to hona chahiye na hindi kuch samajhta ho to. Language bhi to samajh mein aani chahiye unko wo wo direct bolta hai english mein baat karo english mein baat kare thodi bahut uske baad bhi wo are wo dur padega nahi aisa vaisa kar leta hai baat hi khatam ho jati uske baad. Kya? Transport bhada vagera kyuki West Bengal wala gaya hi tha pichle month se pehle. West Bengal wale ka gaye tha ab us vyakti ko transport mein bheja saat din mein usko delivery mili uske baad bhi conversion to ho raha hai na sir aapka IndiaMART pe. Are yaar kaha main abhi bol raha hu is monthly nahi ho raha yaar mam. Is month mein kuch bhi karao. Nahi hua hai na sir abhi tak. Is month mein kuch bhi karao is month mein kuch bhi karao to package ho payega nahi to kya karenge hath pe hath dhar ke baithenge thodi kya yaar? Jo bhi baat hai clear hai wo Ashutosh dekho. Abhi pending hai. Dekho meri baat suno wo Ashutosh wala beech mein baitha hai marketing aisi bikri hui hai meri ki pucho mat. Mere 10 lakh ka client aaya tha wo bhi chhin liya main kya karu yaar? Meri aankho ke samne just mere se baat karke gaya dusre din bol diya main payment aapke khate mein dalunga sala yaha se gaya aur raste mein ja ke usne waha gadi rok li aur usse mil gaya wapis aur uske baad usne na jane kaan mein aisi baat kahi ki wo to aisi machine ho jati hai na aisi machine ho jayegi kya pata tut jayegi na usko bhadka diya. Aur us customer ko mere yaha se ab wo to bilkul hi out ho gaya kehne ka matlab usne usse baat kari uske baad uske dimag mein na jane kya chakri bitai wo usi se jud gaya ab mera phone hi attend nahi kiya usne uske baad jabki wo bol raha tha ki main to kal payment dalunga. Kya kare? Ye Ashutosh machinery ki baat kar rahe hai aap? Haan haan bilkul just. Maine usse baat kari maine kaha bhaiya aap waha gaye the kya haan yaar Mukesh bhai aapse milne ke baad mere ko machine dikh gayi raste mein to unke waha ruk gaya aur unse baat karne lag gaya aur unse bola ki MTR to phat jata hai ab mam MTR itne ja rahe hai MTR kaise phat jayenge? Hmm? Ab usko aise bhadkane ka kya jarurat pad rahi hai naya naya banda tha usko apan kaise bhi mere ko handle kiya 10 lakh ke product the sab machine milke ab usne yaar aisa bol diya tha wo aadmi kya hai ekdam hiskicha gaya matlab yaar kya pata ye bol raha hai to ho sakta hai usko ye pata nahi uski machine ja gayi hai wo jis jagah gayi hai usi ke usi ke waha pe aas paas area mein ab main aise bol du ki yaar uski to gayi thi sir aur uski machine chali nahi aur wo band padi hai. Apan kisi ko chugli nahi karte kehne ka matlab ek ki do nahi lagana uski khud ki machine gayi hui wo bhi nahi chali wo bhi band padi wo plant bhi band pada hai mere paas sab jankari aa chuki hai fir bhi main nahi bolta hu. Par aisa insaniyat ke naate aisa to nahi karna chahiye yaar hain? Chalo thik hai milke aaya to waha tak thik par aisa thodi bolna chahiye ki wo machine to aise phat jati hai na vaise ho jata hai na aisa plant mat lo. Aadmi pura complete mere yaha pe product leke aaya machine ke pure matlab ki ye machine mein ye dana achha nahi karna hai Mukesh bhai ye karna kam se kam do mahine do ghante tak meeting kari humne baith ke aaram se baat pura solution samajh gaye uske baad wo nikla car se aaya tha kam se kam 120 kilometer dur se aaya tha special milne ke liye baat karne ke liye ab bolo kya kare usse pehle to main usko 50 kilometer call kara tha aapka renewal pending tha uske liye. Ab kya karenge aap? Aapka renewal. Dekho mera to yahi kehna hai meri baat suno. Mera to yahi kehna hai apna jaha tak chal raha hai waha tak chal raha tha agar customer ho gaya customer leke aaoge to apan sale ko kar payenge warna koi matlab nahi aa raha kya matlab aayega fir? Sir abhi aapko service band karani hai kya? Ab main to itni kuch bhi bolunga aapka man ho to band kar do koi baat hi nahi hai dekhenge. Payment nahi aayega aage ka to fir band hi hogi na aap bataiye kaise payment nahi aayega to aap kuch bhi kariye maine to aapko bol diya hai do distiller hai aap deal kara dijiye aapka kam ho jayega. Sir aise kaise deal kara de hume thodi na pata hai kaun sa customer kaisa hai. Aapke hath mein meri meri. Sir agar aisa hota to main distiller ka business kholti aur sare buyer ko apne ghar pe de deti. Aur aisa haan kya? Main bata to nahi hu sir agar mujhe pata hota na kaun sa buyer lega to fir main distiller ka business kholti to sare buyer apne ghar pe nahi deti. Aap aap aapke naukri se kam rakho na yaar kya matlab aa raha hai aap tension lo hi mat aisa kar rahe ho to. Kisi baat ko samajhne ki koshish karo yaar. Abhi sir abhi aap bataiye abhi aapko kya karana hai abhi aapko band karana hai kyuki dekhiye payment nahi aayega to service to band ho hi jayegi. Service continue karne ke liye aapko payment karna hoga. Are are aap nahi loge to koi dusri company mein join karunga. Thik hai? Thik hai sir. Thik hai. Haan. Koi baat nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received export buyleads in domestic package.

- Customer wants executive to connect buyers.

- Customer complains about marketing team stealing clients.

- Customer wants to close the service due to no sales.



Resolution:

- Executive explained export buyleads require separate package.

- Executive denied connecting buyers directly.

- Executive stated service will be discontinued without payment.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join another company.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, distiller, payment, marketing
